long_description: Perfect for smoothies, cocktails, hot tea or soup, the Silipint Pint Cup is practically indestructible and possibly the only cup you'll ever need for camping. BPA-free, nontoxic silicone insulates better than glass, plastic and styrofoam, to keep your drink cool or hot longer. Won't chip, break or burn; safe for the microwave, freezer and dishwasher. Holds 16 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage.
short_description: Perfect for smoothies, cocktails, hot tea or soup, the Silipint Pint Cup is practically indestructible and possibly the only cup you'll ever need for camping.
